item.title: Elasticsearch 8 Java client 應用
item.author: Author
item.description: Lucene做的搜尋引擎，Java, .NET, Python, GO…等等都可以用的 Java Client Operation Process 創建 Index template RDBMS Elasticsearch Table Index Row Document Column Field Schema Mapping SQL DSL 常用分詞器 Analyze Jieba分詞器 (better) IK分詞器 如何跟 Elasticsearch 溝通: Postman Kibnan 1 RestClient restClient = 幾個重要的methods get() search() index() update() indices().putIndexTemplate()
